description: Received <mark>3x Spot Awards</mark> for outstanding quality of work.
Created an <mark>Audit Logging</mark> framework using Java and Spring Boot to intercept every API request in microservices, improving tracking and enhancing security.

Contributed to critical fixes and enhancements in Checkout service in MasterCard Checkout Solutions (MACS), leveraging Java, Spring Boot, and Redis, integrating multiple micro-services and implementing a caching mechanism for optimal performance.

Enhanced project efficiency with a custom <mark>Unused WireMock Cleanup Extension</mark>, monitoring and removing redundant stubbings from functional tests. Successfully deleted 5000 unused WireMocks, significantly optimizing project health.

Developed a versatile <mark>Checkout Toolkit web UI</mark>, garnering praise from both internal and cross-functional teams. Implemented with ReactJS and Spring Boot for optimal performance and usability

Streamlined the <mark>PCI-SSF</mark> features in the application, including Data Encryption and Data Masking, according to user permissions using Java, Spring Boot, and Hibernate. This resulted in improved security compliance.

Implemented an <mark>Event Logging</mark> framework using Java and Spring Boot to raise events for important user actions in all microservices. This improved application monitoring and resulted in a 50% reduction in time taken to identify and resolve issues.
Created BPMN models using <mark>Camunda Zeebe Modeler</mark> to improve process efficiency and reduce development time.
Implemented <mark>JWT authorization</mark> globally in one service for payment processing and worked on microservices orchestration using Camunda.
Developed features for Cerence's Natural Language Processing Server <mark>(NLPS)</mark> using Agile Scrum methodology, improving its functionality and performance.
Designed and built a <mark>data extraction utility</mark> to manage and analyze JSON data.
Tested and deployed <mark>docker</mark> images to Kubernetes for optimal system performance.
Collaborated with QA and deployment teams to ensure high-quality software solutions and effective deployment strategies.
Troubleshot and resolved production issues to minimize downtime and ensure uninterrupted service delivery.
Agile development using <mark>Jira, Jenkins, SVN</mark>.
Worked with the senior software developer to understand the product and technologies used.
Modelling of network devices into logical entities.
Received <mark>Spot Award</mark> for excellent work.
Developed <mark>RESTful web service</mark> to handle data transmission between in-house app and vendor DNS management app for efficient DNS address registration.
Automated package deployment on Linux through <mark>Ansible</mark> and shell scripting.
Contributed to product architectural design and analysis, actively participating in meetings and discussions.
Monitored microservices logs with <mark>EFK Stack</mark> - Elasticsearch, Fluentd, and Kibana.
Orchestrated Docker containers with <mark>Kubernetes</mark> platform for efficient deployment and management of applications.
Managed code with <mark>GitLab/GitHub</mark> and contributed to development of integrated CI/CD pipeline for code reviews, testing, and deployment.
